site.name: Adalo

children.name: App Editor
children.description: This is the Adalo App Editor interface available at https://app.adalo.com.
children.descriptionHtml: This is the Adalo App Editor interface available at https://app.adalo.com.

descriptionTranslation.text_en: This is the Adalo App Editor interface available at https://app.adalo.com.

descriptionHtmlTranslation.text_en: This is the Adalo App Editor interface available at https://app.adalo.com.

children.name: App Editing Backend
children.description: This is the backend service that supports the App Editor interface to load and update the App screens and components.
children.descriptionHtml: This is the backend service that supports the App Editor interface to load and update the App screens and components.

descriptionTranslation.text_en: This is the backend service that supports the App Editor interface to load and update the App screens and components.

descriptionHtmlTranslation.text_en: This is the backend service that supports the App Editor interface to load and update the App screens and components.

children.name: App Previewer
children.description: This functionality powers the app preview and the share feature in the App Editor.
children.descriptionHtml: This functionality powers the app preview and the share feature in the App Editor.

descriptionTranslation.text_en: This functionality powers the app preview and the share feature in the App Editor.

descriptionHtmlTranslation.text_en: This functionality powers the app preview and the share feature in the App Editor.

children.name: Collections
children.description: The collections service that interacts with where application data is stored. If this is down, no data will be available in your apps or your Collections in the editor.
children.descriptionHtml: The collections service that interacts with where application data is stored. If this is down, no data will be available in your apps or your Collections in the editor.

descriptionTranslation.text_en: The collections service that interacts with where application data is stored. If this is down, no data will be available in your apps or your Collections in the editor.

descriptionHtmlTranslation.text_en: The collections service that interacts with where application data is stored. If this is down, no data will be available in your apps or your Collections in the editor.

children.name: Notifications
children.description: This service controls both Apple and Android notifications. It relies on Apple's APNS and Google's Firebase Cloud messaging service. If this is down, notifications may not be delivered.
children.descriptionHtml: This service controls both Apple and Android notifications. It relies on Apple's APNS and Google's Firebase Cloud messaging service. If this is down, notifications may not be delivered.

descriptionTranslation.text_en: This service controls both Apple and Android notifications. It relies on Apple's APNS and Google's Firebase Cloud messaging service. If this is down, notifications may not be delivered.

descriptionHtmlTranslation.text_en: This service controls both Apple and Android notifications. It relies on Apple's APNS and Google's Firebase Cloud messaging service. If this is down, notifications may not be delivered.

children.name: Maps
children.description: This service provides the Additional services needed for the Google Maps component to function. If this is down, it may affect pins showing on your maps.

children.name: Stripe
children.description: All Stripe transactions and payments operate through this service. If this is down, Stripe payments may not work in your app.

children.name: iOS
children.description: The iOS build server manages the work to package and send your app to Testflight. If this is down, iOS builds may not complete.

children.name: Android
children.description: The Android build server packages your app into an .apk or .aab file so that it can be uploaded directly to the Google Play Store. If this is down Android builds may not complete.

components.name: Collections API
components.description: This service handles all of your requests to the Collections API. If this is down, your requests to this API will fail.
components.descriptionHtml: This service handles all of your requests to the Collections API. If this is down, your requests to this API will fail.

descriptionTranslation.text_en: This service handles all of your requests to the Collections API. If this is down, your requests to this API will fail.
descriptionTranslation.text_es: Este servicio maneja todas sus solicitudes a la API de colecciones. Si esto no funciona, sus solicitudes a esta API fallarán.
descriptionTranslation.text_ru: Эта служба обрабатывает все ваши запросы к API коллекций. Если это не так, ваши запросы к этому API не будут выполнены.
descriptionTranslation.text_zh: 该服务处理您对 Collections API 的所有请求。如果出现故障，您对此 API 的请求将会失败。

descriptionHtmlTranslation.text_en: This service handles all of your requests to the Collections API. If this is down, your requests to this API will fail.
descriptionHtmlTranslation.text_es: Este servicio maneja todas sus solicitudes a la API de colecciones. Si esto no funciona, sus solicitudes a esta API fallarán.
descriptionHtmlTranslation.text_ru: Эта служба обрабатывает все ваши запросы к API коллекций. Если это не так, ваши запросы к этому API не будут выполнены.
descriptionHtmlTranslation.text_zh: 该服务处理您对 Collections API 的所有请求。如果出现故障，您对此 API 的请求将失败。

components.name: App Analytics
components.description: This provides all the data you see in the analytics panel inside the editor. If this is down you won't see any analytics data for your apps.

notices.name: Apple outage affecting iOS builds loading to Testflight

nameTranslation.text_en: Apple outage affecting iOS builds loading to Testflight
nameTranslation.text_es: Algunas compilaciones de iOS fallan debido a 2FA
nameTranslation.text_ru: Некоторые сборки iOS не работают из-за 2FA
nameTranslation.text_zh: 一些 iOS 构建由于 2FA 而失败

updates.message:
This has been resolved. 

If your most recent build is not yet visible in TestFlight, please upload a fresh build. This action should resolve situation. Please be aware that occasionally, it might take 1 to 2 hours for a new version to become visible in TestFlight.

If the problem continues even after implementing the new build, please [submit a ticket](https://info.adalo.com/submit-a-support-ticket) and our team will look into it as soon as possible!
updates.messageHtml:
This has been resolved.

If your most recent build is not yet visible in TestFlight, please upload a fresh build. This action should resolve situation. Please be aware that occasionally, it might take 1 to 2 hours for a new version to become visible in TestFlight.

If the problem continues even after implementing the new build, please submit a ticket and our team will look into it as soon as possible!

messageHtmlTranslation.text_en:
This has been resolved.

If your most recent build is not yet visible in TestFlight, please upload a fresh build. This action should resolve situation. Please be aware that occasionally, it might take 1 to 2 hours for a new version to become visible in TestFlight.

If the problem continues even after implementing the new build, please submit a ticket and our team will look into it as soon as possible!
messageHtmlTranslation.text_es:
Esto ha sido resuelto.

Si su compilación más reciente aún no está visible en TestFlight, cargue una compilación nueva. Esta acción debería resolver la situación. Tenga en cuenta que, en ocasiones, una nueva versión puede tardar de 1 a 2 horas en aparecer en TestFlight.

Si el problema persiste incluso después de implementar la nueva compilación, envíe un ticket y nuestro equipo lo investigará lo antes posible.
messageHtmlTranslation.text_ru:
Это было решено.

Если ваша последняя сборка еще не отображается в TestFlight, загрузите новую сборку. Это действие должно разрешить ситуацию. Имейте в виду, что иногда может пройти от 1 до 2 часов, прежде чем новая версия станет видимой в TestFlight.

Если проблема сохраняется даже после внедрения новой сборки, пожалуйста, отправьте заявку, и наша команда рассмотрит ее как можно скорее!
messageHtmlTranslation.text_zh:
这个问题已经解决了。

如果您的最新版本尚未在 TestFlight 中可见，请上传新版本。此操作应该可以解决问题。请注意，有时新版本可能需要 1 到 2 小时才能在 TestFlight 中可见。

如果实施新版本后问题仍然存在，请提交票证，我们的团队将尽快调查！

messageTranslation.text_en:
This has been resolved. 

If your most recent build is not yet visible in TestFlight, please upload a fresh build. This action should resolve situation. Please be aware that occasionally, it might take 1 to 2 hours for a new version to become visible in TestFlight.

If the problem continues even after implementing the new build, please [submit a ticket](https://info.adalo.com/submit-a-support-ticket) and our team will look into it as soon as possible!
messageTranslation.text_es:
Esto ha sido resuelto.

Si su compilación más reciente aún no está visible en TestFlight, cargue una compilación nueva. Esta acción debería resolver la situación. Tenga en cuenta que, en ocasiones, una nueva versión puede tardar de 1 a 2 horas en aparecer en TestFlight.

Si el problema persiste incluso después de implementar la nueva compilación, [envíe un ticket](https://info.adalo.com/submit-a-support-ticket) y nuestro equipo lo investigará lo antes posible.
messageTranslation.text_ru:
Это было решено.

Если ваша последняя сборка еще не отображается в TestFlight, загрузите новую сборку. Это действие должно разрешить ситуацию. Имейте в виду, что иногда может пройти от 1 до 2 часов, прежде чем новая версия станет видимой в TestFlight.

Если проблема сохраняется даже после внедрения новой сборки, пожалуйста, [отправьте заявку](https://info.adalo.com/submit-a-support-ticket), и наша команда рассмотрит ее как можно скорее!
messageTranslation.text_zh:
这个问题已经解决了。

如果您的最新版本尚未在 TestFlight 中可见，请上传新版本。此操作应该可以解决问题。请注意，有时新版本可能需要 1 到 2 小时才能在 TestFlight 中可见。

如果实施新版本后问题仍然存在，请[提交票证](https://info.adalo.com/submit-a-support-ticket)，我们的团队将尽快调查！

updates.message:
Apple is experiencing issues with App Uploads to App Store Connect. This is preventing some builds from loading to Testflight.

We will continue to monitor the situation and update here as soon as this is resolved by [Apple](https://developer.apple.com/system-status/).
updates.messageHtml:
Apple is experiencing issues with App Uploads to App Store Connect. This is preventing some builds from loading to Testflight.

We will continue to monitor the situation and update here as soon as this is resolved by Apple.

messageHtmlTranslation.text_en:
Apple is experiencing issues with App Uploads to App Store Connect. This is preventing some builds from loading to Testflight.

We will continue to monitor the situation and update here as soon as this is resolved by Apple.
messageHtmlTranslation.text_es:
Apple tiene problemas con las cargas de aplicaciones en App Store Connect. Esto hace que algunas compilaciones no puedan completarse o mostrarse en Testflight.

Actualizaremos aquí tan pronto como Apple resuelva esto.
messageHtmlTranslation.text_ru:
Apple испытывает проблемы с загрузкой приложений в App Store Connect. Это приводит к тому, что некоторые сборки невозможно завершить или показать в Testflight.

Мы обновим здесь, как только [Apple] решит эту проблему (https://developer.apple.com/system-status/).
messageHtmlTranslation.text_zh:
Apple 在将应用程序上传到 App Store Connect 时遇到问题。这导致某些构建无法完成或在 Testflight 中显示。

Apple 解决此问题后，我们将立即在此处更新。

messageTranslation.text_en:
Apple is experiencing issues with App Uploads to App Store Connect. This is preventing some builds from loading to Testflight.

We will continue to monitor the situation and update here as soon as this is resolved by [Apple](https://developer.apple.com/system-status/).
messageTranslation.text_es:
Apple tiene problemas con las cargas de aplicaciones en App Store Connect. Esto hace que algunas compilaciones no puedan completarse o mostrarse en Testflight.

Actualizaremos aquí tan pronto como [Apple] (https://developer.apple.com/system-status/) resuelva esto.
messageTranslation.text_ru:
Apple испытывает проблемы с загрузкой приложений в App Store Connect. Это приводит к тому, что некоторые сборки невозможно завершить или показать в Testflight.

Мы обновим здесь, как только [Apple] решит эту проблему (https://developer.apple.com/system-status/).
messageTranslation.text_zh:
Apple 在将应用程序上传到 App Store Connect 时遇到问题。这导致某些构建无法完成或在 Testflight 中显示。

[Apple](https://developer.apple.com/system-status/) 解决此问题后，我们将立即在此处更新。

updates.message: We are currently investigating this incident causing some iOS builds to fail.
updates.messageHtml: We are currently investigating this incident causing some iOS builds to fail.

messageHtmlTranslation.text_en: We are currently investigating this incident causing some iOS builds to fail.
messageHtmlTranslation.text_es: Actualmente estamos investigando este incidente que causa que algunas compilaciones de iOS fallen.
messageHtmlTranslation.text_ru: В настоящее время мы расследуем этот инцидент, вызвавший сбой некоторых сборок iOS.
messageHtmlTranslation.text_zh: 我们目前正在调查这一导致某些 iOS 构建失败的事件。

messageTranslation.text_en: We are currently investigating this incident causing some iOS builds to fail.
messageTranslation.text_es: Actualmente estamos investigando este incidente que causa que algunas compilaciones de iOS fallen.

messageTranslation.text_zh: 我们目前正在调查这一导致某些 iOS 构建失败的事件。
